title: SOC 3.0 - The Evolution of the SOC and How AI is Empowering Human Talent
description: Organizations today face relentless cyber attacks, with high-profile breaches hitting the headlines almost daily. Reflecting on a long journey in the security field, it’s clear this isn’t just a human problem—it’s a math problem.
